Thoughts on inscribed handles as nostr usernames? Basically you inscribe a text file on bitcoin ordinals, if you wanted the username @batman you would simply inscribe the text @batman and the first person to inscribe that would be the owner of that username. And there can only be 1 owner of each unique username. You could then tie @batman to your public key and that handle would be your username on nostr. I started a project called inscribed handles and I have some of the rarest handles which I want to give away to the nostr community to increase adoption.
Aww, come on, it's fun! I did it! Try it üòÑ
Me segue que eu te sigo devolta
Acesse a vers√£o web atrav√©s do navegador tor (crie um novo perfil l√°, esse seu j√° est√° ligado a sua identidade). E n√£o passe informa√ß√µes que ligue a sua identidade.
I don't believe so. Check out the Onyx dev's thread with the Amethyst dev for more information.

"Operation Northwoods was a proposed false flag operation against American citizens that originated within the US Department of Defense of the United States government in 1962. The proposals called for CIA operatives to both stage and commit acts of violent terrorism against American military and civilian targets, blaming them on the Cuban government, and using it to justify a war against Cuba. The possibilities detailed in the document included the remote control of civilian aircraft which would be secretly repainted as US Air Force plane, a fabricated 'shoot down' of a US Air Force fighter aircraft off the coast of Cuba, the possible assassination of Cuban immigrants, sinking boats of Cuban refugees on the high seas, blowing up a U.S. ship, and orchestrating terrorism in U.S. cities. The proposals were rejected by President John F. Kennedy."

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Operation_Northwoods

"Project MKUltra (or MK-Ultra) was an illegal human experimentation program designed and undertaken by the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency (CIA), intended to develop procedures and identify drugs that could be used during interrogations to weaken people and force confessions through brainwashing and psychological torture. It began in 1953 and was halted in 1973. MKUltra used numerous methods to manipulate its subjects' mental states and brain functions, such as the covert administration of high doses of psychoactive drugs (especially LSD) and other chemicals without the subjects' consent, electroshocks, hypnosis, sensory deprivation, isolation, verbal and sexual abuse, and other forms of torture."

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/MKUltra

"Operation Paperclip was a secret United States intelligence program in which more than 1,600 German scientists, engineers, and technicians were taken from the former Nazi Germany to the U.S. for government employment after the end of World War II in Europe, between 1945 and 1959. Conducted by the Joint Intelligence Objectives Agency (JIOA), it was largely carried out by special agents of the U.S. Army's Counterintelligence Corps (CIC). Many of these personnel were former members and some were former leaders of the Nazi Party."

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Operation_Paperclip

"The Business Plot (also called the Wall Street Putsch and The White House Putsch) was a political conspiracy in 1933, in the United States, to overthrow the government of President Franklin D. Roosevelt and install Smedley Butler as dictator."

https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Business_Plot

This is a RoboSats public support group. If you're experiencing issues with using RoboSats, have questions about how to use it, or just want to hang out with other cool robots, then this is the place!

msg.content:
Read "Darwin's Doubt" and/or "Signature In The Cell" by Stephen C Meyer.

The answer is nuanced, and therefore does not belong on the internet, but I will try to summarize. üòÇ

Evolutionary theory is only partially true. Life forms can change over time. But it is not scientifically possible for one distinct form of life to "evolve" from another.

The best evidence we have, that evolutionists ignore because of their strong preference for atheism, is that every distinct form of life was encoded by an intelligence capable of writing highly sophisticated code (DNA). DNA exhibits all the properties of machine code including compression, control structures, algorithms, and error checking. DNA is often more sophisticated than anything humans have prosuced. Many segments of DNA, across species, can be read forward and backward, and both directions will produce a distinct yet functional protein. That's like running your JavaScript or Python code backwards and having it do something completely different yet useful ü§Ø

All of the arguments that evolutionists use are completely dismantled, burned, shot, shredded, buried, and banished in Meyer's books. The science is incredible, but we should not be surprised that Darwinism, a theory invented before the discovery of DNA over 100 years ago, did not stand up to scrutiny under the last 70 years of discoveries in molecular biology.

Obviously science can't tell us who made life on earth, but it can tell us that whoever did it likes to code. And actual science makes it clear that the idea of evolution through mutation is mathematically impossible.

You don't need to be a young earther to deny evolution. In fact, young earth theories don't hold up very well to science either, just like evolutionary theory.

Evolutionary theory is a dead theory pushed by people who are too afraid of the consequences of a creator. So they push this big scam on you that you aren't allowed to question, just like everything else we are told to believe these days.

Unfortunately, every time I have brought this up in Christian or Catholic circles I have been ridiculed. üòÆ‚Äçüí® If you want the truth, go read the books. I think it makes more sense than anything else I have ever heard.

If our God made everything, all scientific endeavors are a pursuit of Him through His works.
